content.rendered:
What’s an extravagant but burdensome gift which cannot be easily disposed of? You guessed it, a white elephant gift! Wish you could give away your junk car as a white elephant gift this holiday season? With Aero Auto Parts, now you can!
If the junk car in your driveway feels more like a giant, pink elephant in the room, Aero Auto Parts is here to help!!! We want to buy your junk cars. Did we mention we’ll take it off your hands same day, give you cash on the spot, and no pick-up fees?
No, Christmas hasn’t come early. We offer these services year round!
Doesn’t run? No problem!
Whether your car runs or not, we want it. If the engine has crapped out, the transmission has fallen apart, or the problems are still a mystery, call today and schedule your car pickup for the same day.
If you have an old car that’s more hassle than you think it’s worth? Call 773-483-2626 today to schedule your hassle-free, same day pickup. And if that weren’t enough, get cash on the spot!
